verses.text: Now those that \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \add were\add*, \w Nehemiah|strong="H5166"\w*, the \w Tirshatha|strong="H8660"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hachaliah|strong="H2446"\w*, and \w Zidkijah|strong="H6667"\w*,\f + \fr 10.1 \ft those…: Heb. at the sealings\f*\f + \fr 10.1 \ft the Tirshatha: or, the governor\f*
\w Maaziah|strong="H4590"\w*, \w Bilgai|strong="H1084"\w*, \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*: these \add were\add* the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*.

And the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: both \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azaniah|strong="H0245"\w*, \w Binnui|strong="H1131"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Henadad|strong="H2582"\w*, \w Kadmiel|strong="H6934"\w*;
And their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \w Shebaniah|strong="H7645"\w*, \w Hodijah|strong="H1941"\w*, \w Kelita|strong="H7042"\w*, \w Pelaiah|strong="H6411"\w*, \w Hanan|strong="H2605"\w*,

The \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \w Parosh|strong="H6551"\w*, \w Pahath-moab|strong="H6355"\w*, \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, \w Zatthu|strong="H2240"\w*, \w Bani|strong="H1137"\w*,

¶ And the \w rest|strong="H7605"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*, the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, the \w Nethinims|strong="H5411"\w*, and all they that had \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* themselves from the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* unto the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, every one having \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*, and having \w understanding|strong="H0995"\w*;

They \w clave|strong="H2388"\w* to their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, their \w nobles|strong="H0117"\w*, and \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into a \w curse|strong="H0423"\w*, and into an \w oath|strong="H7621"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in \w God’s|strong="H0430"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, which was \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and to \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*, and his \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* and his \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*;\f + \fr 10.29 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*

And that we would not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* unto the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, nor \w take|strong="H3947"\w* their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* for our \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*:

And \add if\add* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w ware|strong="H4728"\w* or any \w victuals|strong="H7668"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* to \w sell|strong="H4376"\w*, \add that\add* we would not \w buy|strong="H3947"\w* it of them on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, or on the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and \add that\add* we would \w leave|strong="H5203"\w* the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, and the \w exaction|strong="H4853"\w* of every \w debt|strong="H3027"\w*.\f + \fr 10.31 \ft every…: Heb. every hand\f*

Also we \w made|strong="H5975"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4687"\w* for us, to \w charge|strong="H5414"\w* ourselves \w yearly|strong="H8141"\w* with the third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* of a \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*;

For the \w shewbread|strong="H4635"\w*, and for the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and for the \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*, of the \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, of the new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, for the set \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, and for the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add things\add*, and for the sin \w offerings|strong="H2403"\w* to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \add for\add* all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

And we \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* the \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* among the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, for the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \w offering|strong="H7133"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, after the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, at \w times|strong="H6256"\w* \w appointed|strong="H2163"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* by \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, to \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*:

And to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* of our \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*, and the \w firstfruits|strong="H1061"\w* of all \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of all \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, \w year|strong="H8141"\w* by \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

Also the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of our \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and of our \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, and the \w firstlings|strong="H1062"\w* of our \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* and of our \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

And \add that\add* we should \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w* of our \w dough|strong="H6182"\w*, and our \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of all manner of \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*, of \w wine|strong="H8492"\w* and of \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, unto the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, to the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and the \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* of our \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, that the same \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* might have the \w tithes|strong="H6237"\w* in all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of our \w tillage|strong="H5656"\w*.

And the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall be with the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, when the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* take \w tithes|strong="H6237"\w*: and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w* of the \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, into the \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

For the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, of the new \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and the \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, unto the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w*, where \add are\add* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* that \w minister|strong="H8334"\w*, and the \w porters|strong="H7778"\w*, and the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*: and we will not \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
